participant_1.background:
I write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.
i go to the theater to watch plays.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
i used to smoke.
I'm not very close to my parents, but I try to be there for them when I can.

participant_2.background:
I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family.
i enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.
I met my family through the military.
i prefer headsets over earbuds.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

content.text: Hey there! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch funny and lighthearted shows to take my mind off of my worries.
That's great! I like to write stories that transport my readers to another world, where they can escape from the stresses of their everyday lives.
That sounds like a really fun hobby! I'm not very good at writing, but I enjoy reading.
What do you like to read?
I like to read books about history and politics. I also enjoy watching documentaries.
I'm not very interested in politics, but I do enjoy history. I love learning about different cultures and time periods.
That's great! I think it's important to be informed about the world around us.
I agree! It's important to be aware of what's going on in the world, even if it's not always pleasant.
I totally agree! It's important to stay informed, but it's also important to take breaks from the news sometimes.
I know what you mean! It can be really overwhelming to be constantly bombarded with information.
That's why I like to watch funny and lighthearted shows to take my mind off of things.
Me too! It's important to have a good laugh every now and then.
